Interface Synchronizer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BarrierSynchronizer

    public interface Synchronizer
extends Cancellable
    Synchronizers are used to ensure that all agents are at the same point in the execution of a program

      Checks whether all robots have arrived at a barrier
      void barrierSync(java.lang.String barrierID)

      • barrierProceed

        boolean barrierProceed(java.lang.String barrierID)
        Checks whether all robots have arrived at a barrier
        Parameters:
        barrierID - The identifier of the barrier to check against
        Returns:
        True if all robots have signaled their arrival at the barrier, false otherwise
